blog_content:
In this writeup we have to try and find the password for level 3 of Natas by solving the level 2 of Natas. We got the password for level 2 byt solving the previous challenge (OverTheWire: Natas: Solving Natas 1 -> Natas 2).

Prompt for level 2 on OverTheWire.org is -



Navigating to challenge website (http://natas2.natas.labs.overthewire.org/) and using username: natas2 and password: ZluruAthQk7Q2MqmDeTiUij2ZvWy2mBi, we are greeted by the same landing page.



Again, there doesn't seem to be a flag in the rendered page itself, let's try viewing the source code of the page.



The code clearly states that the files in declared in the header section of the page have nothing to do with the challenges, so we can ignore those for now.There's a image file named 'pixel.png', but it is literally a single pixel.

What's interesting is that there's a path to the image, i.e 'files/pixel.png', this may be worth looking, Let's navigate to 'http://natas2.natas.labs.overthewire.org/files'



We can see that there's another file named 'users.txt' let's try opening it.



Voila!! we have the password for the next level.

Password for Level 2 is: sJIJNW6ucpu6HPZ1ZAchaDtwd7oGrD14
